job_description: Full-Stack Engineer 1082 - job post Certec Consulting Westlake, TX Full-time, Part-time, Internship, Seasonal Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Job Type Full-time Part-time Internship Seasonal Title: Java- API Visa : W2(USC/GC/H4/L2/GC-EAD/H1-B) ONLY NO C2C Location : hybrid 5 days onsite/month. Locations are NC, MMK or Westlake Texas Duration : 12+ months to start What does your team do? We are seeking a Full-Stack Engineer to develop our enterprise-wide customer data capture capabilities. In this role, you will use a combination of and back-end technologies (REST APIs and Databases) and front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS) to build micro front ends that help our customers update their personal information while on our websites and mobile apps. Top Required Skills: Rest API (Api development from scratch; updating etc) Java 8 Clear communication skills. What are nice to have skills? Great communication Are you emerging Full-Stack Software Engineer with a passion for delivering high impact data-driven customer experiences? Do you want to work on solutions that span across large organizations? Are you looking for a collaborative team environment where you will have a wealth of opportunities to innovate and have intellectual curiosity to learn! A career in Customer Data and Marketing Technologies (CDMT) may be right for you! We are seeking a Full-Stack Engineer to develop our enterprise-wide customer data capture capabilities. In this role, you will use a combination of and back-end technologies (REST APIs and Databases) and front-end technologies (JavaScript, HTML, CSS) to build micro front ends that help our customers update their personal information while on our websites and mobile apps. This position is a critical element to delivering Fidelity's promise of crafting the best customer experiences in financial services. The Expertise and Skills You Bring Bachelor's or master's degree in a technology related field (e.g. Engineering, Computer Science, etc.) At least 6 years of validated experience with the requirements below Design and Development of HTTP based APIs, Microservices, Networking and how the internet works Strong hands-on experience with Rest API development (Java / Spring boot preferred) Hands-on Skills with Database Technologies (Such as Oracle, Dynamo, etc.) Knowledge of front-end solutions using JavaScript, Typescript, CSS, HTML & Browser Developer tools Git skills and understanding of respective branching strategies Desire to learn how to use marketing technology tools (such as Adobe Target, Ensighten, SDL Tridion, Adobe AEM, etc.) Basic understanding of A/B/N testing techniques, Design of Experiments, Measurement and Recommendations Participating in problem solving, troubleshooting, performance turning, production support, and maintenance of existing applications Dedication to high quality, balanced with rapid pace of delivery delivering technology changes to end users every two weeks, and as frequent as daily Ability to work optimally in global teams distributed across geographic locations Go to our Website Job listing here: Job Listing 1082 Please download and complete this Matrix prior to submission. PM 1082 Then PLEASE USE EASY "APPLY BUTTON" (not just apply button) TO SUBMIT RESUME AND SKILLS MATRIX Job Listing 1082 The send an email to the listers email address with just candidate name and job number. NO need to attached resume or anything else. Thanks, Jay Kernes Certec Consulting, inc Fax 888-523-7832 We are certified as a Women's Business Enterprise (WBE) If you require alternative methods of application or screening, you must approach the employer directly to request this as Indeed is not responsible for the employer's application process.
